K10D0275_H0277:101b-1: a'arya buddha bh'u mi n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0275_H0277:101b-3: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0275_H0277:101b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0275_H0277:101b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-1: khang chen po rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar ba bkod pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-2: 'jig rten khams dpag tu med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer chen po rab tu 'byung ba /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-3: gnas tha dad pa shin tu rnam par phye ba tshad med pa rnam par gnas pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-5: khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-6: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-7: shin tu rnam par dag cing dbang sgyur ba'i rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-9: byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa'i dge 'dun rjes su song ba /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-22: mi ma yin pa tshad med pa rnam par rgyu ba /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-23: chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-24: bde ba chen pos brtan pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-25: sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad yang dag par thob par byed par nye bar gnas pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-26: nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-27: bdud thams cad yongs su spangs pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-28: thams cad kyi bkod pa las lhag pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bkod pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102a-32: rtogs pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba yin pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-0: zhi gnas @102b dang; lhag mthong chen po'i bzhon pa yin pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-1: rnam par thar ba'i sgo chen po stong pa nyid dang /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-3: smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa; rin po che
K10D0275_H0277:102b-4: chen po'i padma'i rgyal po yon tan gyi tshogs tshad
K10D0275_H0277:102b-5: med pas brgyan pa'i bkod pa la brten pa na
K10D0275_H0277:102b-7: legs par thugs su chud pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-8: kun tu spyod pa gnyis mi mnga' ba /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-9: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la mchog tu gzhol bar mdzad pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-10: sangs rgyas kyi gnas pas gnas pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-11: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-12: sgrib pa med pa'i rtogs pa brnyes pa; phyir mi zlog pa'i chos dang ldan pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-14: bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'jog pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-15: dus gsum la mnyam pa nyid tshar phyin pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-17: chos thams cad la the tshom med pa'i mkhyen pa mnga' ba /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-18: spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-19: chos mkhyen pa la nem nur mi mnga' ba /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-20: rnam pa ma brtags pa'i sku mnga' ba /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-21: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ye shes yang dag par blangs pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-22: sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyis su med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa /
K10D0275_H0277:102b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa rnam par thar
K10D0275_H0277:102b-24: par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin par mtha'
K10D0275_H0277:102b-25: dang / dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-2: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-3: phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa de nyan thos kyi
K10D0275_H0277:103a-4: dge 'dun tshad med pa thams cad kyang cang shes
K10D0275_H0277:103a-6: sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-7: shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-8: tshul khrims shin tu rnam par dag pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-9: chos 'dod pa rnams bde ba dang phrad pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-13: legs par bsam pa sems pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-15: legs par bya ba'i las byed pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-19: nges par 'byung ba'i shes rab can /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-20: nges par rtogs pa'i shes rab can /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-24: shes rab mnyam pa med pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-25: shes rab rin po che dang ldan pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-26: rig pa gsum dang ldan pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-27: tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'i mchog thob pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-28: yon yongs su sbyong ba chen po /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-29: spyod lam rab tu zhi ba /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-32: nges pa chen po dang ldan pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag dang /
K10D0275_H0277:103a-34: byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus pa la sogs
K10D0275_H0277:103a-35: pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus
K10D0275_H0277:103a-36: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag
K10D0275_H0277:103a-37: tu med pa thams cad kyang gnas chen po la
K10D0275_H0277:103b-0: theg pa @103b chen po'i chos kyis nges par byung ba /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-1: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-3: bskal pa ma yin par rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-4: bdud phyir rgol ba thams cad nges par bcom pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa thams cad las ring du gyur ba /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-7: chos chen po'i ro'i dga' ba dang /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-8: bde bas nye bar brtan pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-9: 'jigs pa lnga las yang dag par 'das pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-10: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bgrod pa gcig par gyur pa can /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-11: sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa thams cad rab
K10D0275_H0277:103b-12: tu zhi bar byed pa'i sa mngon du gyur pa
K10D0275_H0277:103b-13: sha stag dang thabs gcig go /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-16: sangs rgyas kyi sa ni chos lngas bsdus pa yin te /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-19: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-20: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-21: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-22: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-23: bya ba bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyis so //
K10D0275_H0277:103b-25: de la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-28: nam mkha' ni gzugs su gyur pa sna tshogs kyi
K10D0275_H0277:103b-29: rnam pa thams cad na kun na yod kyang des
K10D0275_H0277:103b-30: brjod par bya ba'ang ma yin /
K10D0275_H0277:103b-31: sna tshogs kyang ma yin te ro gcig go /
K10D0275_H0277:104a-0: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'ang shes @104a *//
K10D0275_H0277:104a-1: bya sna tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cad la kun
K10D0275_H0277:104a-2: na yod kyang des brjod par bya ba'ang ma yin
K10D0275_H0277:104a-3: / sna tshogs kyang ma yin te ro gcig go /
K10D0275_H0277:104a-7: nam mkha' ni gzugs su gyur pa thams cad tha
K10D0275_H0277:104a-8: mi dad par zhugs kyang gzugs kyi nyes pa rnams
K10D0275_H0277:104a-10: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos
K10D0275_H0277:104a-11: kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'ang sems can thams cad
K10D0275_H0277:104a-12: dang sems mnyam pa nyid kyi yongs su grub pas
K10D0275_H0277:104a-13: tha mi dad par zhugs kyang sems can gyi nyes
K10D0275_H0277:104a-14: pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos so //
K10D0275_H0277:104a-20: yid kyi las su gyur pa thams cad la go 'byed kyang nam mkha' ni rtsol pa'ang med /
K10D0275_H0277:104a-21: mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med do //
K10D0275_H0277:104a-22: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'ang ye shes dang /
K10D0275_H0277:104a-24: sems can gyi bya ba sgrub pa thams cad kyi
K10D0275_H0277:104a-25: go 'byed kyang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa
K10D0275_H0277:104a-27: mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med do //
K10D0275_H0277:104a-31: nam mkha' la gzugs rnam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi skye ba'ang snang /
K10D0275_H0277:104a-32: 'jigs pa'ang snang yang nam mkha' ni skye ba'ang med /
K10D0275_H0277:104b-0: de bzhin du de bzhin @104b gshegs pa rnams kyi
K10D0275_H0277:104b-1: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la yang ye
K10D0275_H0277:104b-3: sems can gyi bya ba sgrub pa thams cad kyi skye ba'ang snang /
K10D0275_H0277:104b-4: 'jig pa'ang snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni skye ba'ang med /
K10D0275_H0277:104b-9: nam mkha' la gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dag gi 'phel ba'ang snang /
K10D0275_H0277:104b-10: 'grib pa'ang snang yang nam mkha' la ni 'phel ba'ang med /
K10D0275_H0277:104b-12: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos
K10D0275_H0277:104b-13: kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la de bzhin gshegs
K10D0275_H0277:104b-14: pa'i bstan pa nying khu 'phel ba'ang snang /
K10D0275_H0277:104b-15: nub par 'gyur ba'ang snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni 'phel ba'ang med /
K10D0275_H0277:104b-20: nam mkha' thug pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' la
K10D0275_H0277:104b-21: phyogs bcu na gzugs su gyur pa rnams mtha' yas
K10D0275_H0277:104b-22: mu med kyang nam mkha' ni 'gro ba'am /
K10D0275_H0277:104b-26: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa
K10D0275_H0277:104b-27: mtha' thug pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0275_H0277:104b-28: rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la
K10D0275_H0277:104b-29: phyogs bcu dag na sems can thams cad la phan
K10D0275_H0277:104b-30: pa dang / bde pa so sor nye bar gnas
K10D0275_H0277:104b-31: par bya ba dag mtha' yas mu med kyang chos
K10D0275_H0277:104b-32: kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni 'gro ba'am /
K10D0275_H0277:105a-4: nam mkha' la stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig pa dag kyang snang /
K10D0275_H0277:105a-5: 'chags pa dag kyang snang yang nam mkha' ni 'jig pa'ang ma yin /
K10D0275_H0277:105a-7: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos
K10D0275_H0277:105a-8: kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la rnam pa thams
K10D0275_H0277:105a-9: cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:105a-10: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dpag tu med
K10D0275_H0277:105a-11: pa dag snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag
K10D0275_H0277:105a-12: pa la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang med
K10D0275_H0277:105a-13: / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang med do //
K10D0275_H0277:105a-17: nam mkha' la rten pa gzugs su gyur pa dag la snang ba dang /
K10D0275_H0277:105a-20: skam pa dang; 'gyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs snang
K10D0275_H0277:105a-21: yang nam mkha' la ni de dag gis 'gyur ba'ang
K10D0275_H0277:105a-22: med / yongs su skyo ba'ang med do //
K10D0275_H0277:105a-23: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos
K10D0275_H0277:105a-24: kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la rten pa'i sems
K10D0275_H0277:105a-25: can gyi khams la bslab pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:105a-28: yid kyi las log par grub pa rnam pa mang
K10D0275_H0277:105a-29: po snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa
K10D0275_H0277:105a-30: ni de dag gis 'gyur ba'ang med /
K10D0275_H0277:105a-31: yongs su skyo ba'ang med do //
K10D0275_H0277:105b-0: nam mkha' la rten pa'i sa chen po'ang @105b snang; ri chen po dang /
K10D0275_H0277:105b-5: zla ba rgyu ba dag kyang snang yang nam mkha' ni de dag gi mtshan nyid ma yin no //
K10D0275_H0277:105b-6: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos
K10D0275_H0277:105b-7: kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la tshul khrims dang
K10D0275_H0277:105b-11: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po
K10D0275_H0277:105b-12: dag snang yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa
K10D0275_H0277:105b-13: ni de dag gi mtshan nyid ma yin no //
K10D0275_H0277:105b-18: rkyen gzhan dang gzhan 'dus pa'i stong gsum gyi stong
K10D0275_H0277:105b-19: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor dpag
K10D0275_H0277:105b-20: tu med pa dag snang yang de la nam mkha'
K10D0275_H0277:105b-22: mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med do //
K10D0275_H0277:105b-23: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos
K10D0275_H0277:105b-24: kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0275_H0277:105b-25: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad phun sum
K10D0275_H0277:105b-26: tshogs pa dpag tu med pa dag snang yang chos
K10D0275_H0277:105b-27: kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la ni rtsol ba'ang
K10D0275_H0277:105b-28: med / mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med do //
K10D0275_H0277:105b-30: me long lta bu'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste /
K10D0275_H0277:105b-32: ma long gi dkyil 'khor la rten nas /
K10D0275_H0277:105b-34: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me
K10D0275_H0277:105b-35: long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la rten
K10D0275_H0277:106a-0: de'i yul la rnam par shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag @106a *//
K10D0275_H0277:106a-2: de bas na me long gi dkyil 'khor dang /
K10D0275_H0277:106a-3: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pas mnyam pa ste /
K10D0275_H0277:106a-4: des na me long lta bu'i ye shes de me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
K10D0275_H0277:106a-5: de lta bas na me long gi dkyil 'khor ni de'i dper rig par bya'o //
K10D0275_H0277:106a-9: mi bsod nams 'dod pa la la zhig gis skye
K10D0275_H0277:106a-10: bo phal bo che ji snyed 'ongs shing lhags pa
K10D0275_H0277:106a-11: dag rang gi lus kyi skyon dang /
K10D0275_H0277:106a-12: yon tan la so sor rtog par bya ba'i phyir
K10D0275_H0277:106a-13: me long gi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas bzang por
K10D0275_H0277:106a-14: mi 'gul bar bzhag na skyon sel cing yon tan
K10D0275_H0277:106a-16: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me
K10D0275_H0277:106a-17: long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang sems
K10D0275_H0277:106a-18: can dpag tu med grangs med pa ji snyed pa
K10D0275_H0277:106a-19: dag kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:106a-20: rnam par byang ba la so sor rtog par bya
K10D0275_H0277:106a-21: ba'i phyir rgyun mi 'chad pas mi g-yo bar chos
K10D0275_H0277:106a-22: kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i gnas su bzhag na
K10D0275_H0277:106a-23: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:106a-24: rnam par byang ba sel ba dang /
K10D0275_H0277:106a-29: me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu phyis pa gsal
K10D0275_H0277:106a-30: zhing rnam par dag la g-ya' med pa ni kun
K10D0275_H0277:106a-31: tu lam me thal le lhang nge'o //
K10D0275_H0277:106a-32: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me
K10D0275_H0277:106b-0: long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil @106b 'khor sangs
K10D0275_H0277:106b-1: rgyas kyi ye shes nyon mongs pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:106b-2: shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma bsal ba shin tu
K10D0275_H0277:106b-3: sbyangs pa'ang de la rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs
K10D0275_H0277:106b-4: su bzung bas gsal zhing rnam par dag la g-ya'
K10D0275_H0277:106b-5: med de / sems can thams cad kyi bya ba
K10D0275_H0277:106b-6: sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir lam me thal le lhang
K10D0275_H0277:106b-10: me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs kyi rkyen la
K10D0275_H0277:106b-11: ltos nas gzugs brnyan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyur 'gyur
K10D0275_H0277:106b-12: ro // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
K10D0275_H0277:106b-13: kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
K10D0275_H0277:106b-14: yang sems can gyi dus kyi rkyen la ltos nas
K10D0275_H0277:106b-15: ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyur
K10D0275_H0277:106b-19: me long gi dkyil 'khor la gzugs brnyan rnam pa
K10D0275_H0277:106b-20: du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang po snang yang
K10D0275_H0277:106b-21: me long gi dkyil 'khor de la de dag yod
K10D0275_H0277:106b-23: de la me long gi dkyil 'khor de ni rtsol ba'ang med /
K10D0275_H0277:106b-24: mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med do //
K10D0275_H0277:106b-25: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me
K10D0275_H0277:106b-26: long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la shes
K10D0275_H0277:106b-27: pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna
K10D0275_H0277:106b-28: tshogs mang po 'byung yang me long lta bu'i ye
K10D0275_H0277:106b-29: shes kyi dkyil 'khor de la shes pa'i gzugs brnyan
K10D0275_H0277:106b-30: de dag yod pa ma yin te /
K10D0275_H0277:106b-31: de la me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor de rtsol ba'ang med /
K10D0275_H0277:106b-32: mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med do //
K10D0275_H0277:107a-1: gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma
K10D0275_H0277:107a-2: sna tshogs mang po de dag dang ldan pa'ang ma
K10D0275_H0277:107a-3: yin / mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te /
K10D0275_H0277:107a-4: de dag dang mi nye ba dang /
K10D0275_H0277:107a-5: de'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0275_H0277:107a-6: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me
K10D0275_H0277:107a-7: long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang shes
K10D0275_H0277:107a-8: pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma sna tshogs mang
K10D0275_H0277:107a-9: po de dag dang ldan pa'ang ma yin; mi ldan
K10D0275_H0277:107a-11: de dag dang mi nye pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:107a-12: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro //
K10D0275_H0277:107a-16: me long gi dkyil 'khor ngos thams cad nas legs par phyis pa ni mdun dang /
K10D0275_H0277:107a-19: kun nas kyang gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10D0275_H0277:107a-20: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me
K10D0275_H0277:107a-21: long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su
K10D0275_H0277:107a-22: mchad pa dang / tshad med pa'i rnam par shin
K10D0275_H0277:107a-23: tu sbyangs pa'ang kun nas shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams
K10D0275_H0277:107a-26: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams nyan thos kyi theg pas nges par 'byung bar bya ba dang /
K10D0275_H0277:107a-27: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams rang sangs
K10D0275_H0277:107a-28: rgyas kyi theg pas nges par 'byung bar bya ba
K10D0275_H0277:107a-29: dang / theg pa chen po pa rnams theg pa
K10D0275_H0277:107a-30: chen pos nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir nyan
K10D0275_H0277:107a-31: thos kyi theg pa shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams dang
K10D0275_H0277:107a-32: dang / / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa shes
K10D0275_H0277:107b-0: pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams @107b dang; theg pa chen po
K10D0275_H0277:107b-1: shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams kyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10D0275_H0277:107b-10: khyim dang; gzhal med khang chen po'i gzugs brnyan snang ste /
K10D0275_H0277:107b-11: gzugs brnyan chen po dag snang yang me long gi dkyil 'khor ni de'i tshad du ma yin no //
K10D0275_H0277:107b-12: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me
K10D0275_H0277:107b-13: long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la'ang byang
K10D0275_H0277:107b-14: chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bzung ste sangs
K10D0275_H0277:107b-15: rgyas kyi sa'i bar dag gi ye shes kyi gzugs
K10D0275_H0277:107b-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag kyang snang ste /
K10D0275_H0277:107b-19: me long lta bu'i ye shes la ni tshad yongs su chad pa gang yang med do //
K10D0275_H0277:107b-22: me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs gzhan gyis bsgribs
K10D0275_H0277:107b-23: pa'i gzugs rnams la gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi
K10D0275_H0277:107b-24: 'gyur ro // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0275_H0277:107b-25: rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil
K10D0275_H0277:107b-26: 'khor yang sems can yi dge ba'i grogs pos zin
K10D0275_H0277:107b-27: pa dam pa'i chos ma yin pa nyan pas bsgribs
K10D0275_H0277:107b-28: pa dag la ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i
K10D0275_H0277:107b-30: snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0275_H0277:107b-34: me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs mun pa'i nang
K10D0275_H0277:107b-35: du bzhag pa rnams kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur
K10D0275_H0277:108a-1: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me
K10D0275_H0277:108a-2: long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang sems
K10D0275_H0277:108a-3: can nyes par spyod pa la dga' pa ma rig
K10D0275_H0277:108a-4: pa'i mun par zhugs pa rnams la ye shes kyi
K10D0275_H0277:108a-5: gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur te /
K10D0275_H0277:108a-6: snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

K10D0275_H0277:108a-14: long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang sems
K10D0275_H0277:108a-15: can dam pa'i chos kyis phongs par 'gyur pa'i las
K10D0275_H0277:108a-16: rnam par dag pa ma yin pa la gnas pa

K10D0275_H0277:108a-18: kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur te /
K10D0275_H0277:108a-19: snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

K10D0275_H0277:108a-24: dga' ba mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa yongs su grub pa las dang /
K10D0275_H0277:108a-25: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyams su myong ba
K10D0275_H0277:108a-26: mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa yongs su grub
K10D0275_H0277:108a-27: pa las dang / mtshan nyid dben pa mtshan nyid
K10D0275_H0277:108a-28: med par mnyam par nyid khong du chud pa'i yongs
K10D0275_H0277:108a-30: yongs su skyab pa'i rnam pa'i byams pa chen po
K10D0275_H0277:108a-31: mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa'i yongs su grub
K10D0275_H0277:108b-0: pa las dang / @108b yal bar mi 'dor ba'i
K10D0275_H0277:108b-1: rnam pa'i snying rje chen po mnyam pa nyid khong
K10D0275_H0277:108b-2: du chud pa'i yongs su grub pa las dang /
K10D0275_H0277:108b-3: sems can thams cad la mos pa ji lta ba
K10D0275_H0277:108b-4: bzhin du gzugs kyi lus kun tu ston pa mnyam
K10D0275_H0277:108b-5: pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang /

K10D0275_H0277:108b-7: 'jig rten nye bar zhi ba dang ro gcig pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang /

K10D0275_H0277:108b-9: sdug bsngal ro gcig pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang /
K10D0275_H0277:108b-10: yon tan shin tu bskyed pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las so //

K10D0275_H0277:108b-26: par rig pa rnam pa sna tshogs can gcig car

K10D0275_H0277:108b-30: la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa
K10D0275_H0277:108b-31: rig pa rnam pa sna tshogs can gcig car 'jug
K10D0275_H0277:109a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams ni kun dga' ra ba dang /

K10D0275_H0277:109a-7: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so
K10D0275_H0277:109a-8: sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang pha rol tu phyin
K10D0275_H0277:109a-9: pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dang /

K10D0275_H0277:109a-18: 'jig rten gyi khams ni 'di lta ste /
K10D0275_H0277:109a-27: tshangs ris la sogs pas shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa yin no //
K10D0275_H0277:109a-28: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang /
K10D0275_H0277:109a-31: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:109a-37: byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par 'grub pa ma

K10D0275_H0277:109b-3: gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs

K10D0275_H0277:110a-23: rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring byed pa la sogs pas yongs su tshol bar byed do //

K10D0275_H0277:110a-29: bzo'i gnas thams cad nye bar bstan te /

K10D0275_H0277:112a-26: bar byed pa des sems can rnams las kun nas
K10D0275_H0277:112a-28: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya
K10D0275_H0277:112a-29: ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kun tu 'byung bar byed
K10D0275_H0277:112a-30: pa yid sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0275_H0277:112a-31: rnams de'i gnyen po'i chos bstan pa'i phyir ming gi
K10D0275_H0277:112a-32: tshogs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang /
K10D0275_H0277:112a-33: yi ge'i tshogs rnams brjod cing thabs la mkhas pa
K10D0275_H0277:112b-0: des kyang sems can rnams @112b bstan pa la 'dzud
K10D0275_H0277:112b-1: par byed / yongs su smin par byed /
K10D0275_H0277:112b-2: rnam par grol bar byed do //
K10D0275_H0277:112b-6: sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las nyams su myong
K10D0275_H0277:112b-7: bar byed pa des sems can rnams bde ba dang
K10D0275_H0277:112b-8: / sdug bsngal so sor myong bar byed do //
K10D0275_H0277:112b-9: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya
K10D0275_H0277:112b-10: ba sgrub pa'i ye shes nyams su myong bar byed
K10D0275_H0277:112b-11: pa yid sprul pa'i las des de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0275_H0277:112b-15: gzhag pa 'dri ba la lan gdab pa dag la
K10D0275_H0277:112b-16: ci rigs par lan gdab par bya ba'i phyir byung
K10D0275_H0277:112b-18: da ltar gyi don rnams rab tu myong bar byed do //
K10D0275_H0277:112b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0275_H0277:112b-21: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag na ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa /
K10D0275_H0277:112b-26: ci de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyid kyi lags sam; 'on te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'ang legs /
K10D0275_H0277:112b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0275_H0277:112b-29: ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa /
K10D0275_H0277:112b-33: nye bar 'dres pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yin par yang blta'o //
K10D0275_H0277:112b-35: ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa /
K10D0275_H0277:113a-1: nye bar 'dres pa byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi legs par blta bar bgyi /
K10D0275_H0277:113a-3: byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi ste /
K10D0275_H0277:113a-4: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de
K10D0275_H0277:113a-5: dag ni gnyis su 'du shes pa'i gnyen por sems
K10D0275_H0277:113a-8: gzhan du 'du shes pa'i gnyen po'o //
K10D0275_H0277:113a-9: de dag de yan chad bdag dang /
K10D0275_H0277:113a-11: ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa /
K10D0275_H0277:113a-17: ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis
K10D0275_H0277:113a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal nas byang
K10D0275_H0277:113a-19: chub sems dpa' rnams la rgya cher yang dag par
K10D0275_H0277:113a-20: rab tu ston par 'gyur ba'i dpe mdzad du gsol
K10D0275_H0277:113a-21: / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0275_H0277:113a-25: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag ji srid du
K10D0275_H0277:113a-26: 'dres pa'i tshal du bzhugs par ma gyur pa de
K10D0275_H0277:113a-27: srid du de dag gi lha'i longs spyod rnams dngos
K10D0275_H0277:113a-28: po dang / nyams su myong ba dang /
K10D0275_H0277:113a-29: nga yir 'dzin pa'i sgo nas 'dres pa /
K10D0275_H0277:113a-30: nye bar 'dres par mi gnas kyi /
K10D0275_H0277:113a-31: gang tshun chad 'dres pa'i tshal du shugs par gyur
K10D0275_H0277:113a-32: pa de'i tshe 'dres pa'i tshal gyi mthu 'di 'dra
K10D0275_H0277:113a-33: ste / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha der zhugs
K10D0275_H0277:113b-0: pa @113b rnams kyi lha'i longs spyod rnams dngos po
K10D0275_H0277:113b-1: ste / dang / nyams su myong ba dang /
K10D0275_H0277:113b-2: nga yir 'dzin pa med par 'dres pa /
K10D0275_H0277:113b-4: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji srid
K10D0275_H0277:113b-5: du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
K10D0275_H0277:113b-6: ma gyur pa de srid du /
K10D0275_H0277:113b-8: rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med pa /
K10D0275_H0277:113b-9: sems mnyam pa de thob nas btang snyoms pa de thob par mi 'gyur te /
K10D0275_H0277:113b-10: gnyis su 'du shes pa de dag ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyod pa /
K10D0275_H0277:113b-14: nye bar 'dres par mi gnas kyi /
K10D0275_H0277:113b-15: gang tshun chad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
K10D0275_H0277:113b-16: thob par gyur pa de phan chad gnyis su 'du
K10D0275_H0277:113b-17: shes pa'i gnyen pos sems mnyam pa thob nas /
K10D0275_H0277:113b-19: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i btang snyoms thob ste /
K10D0275_H0277:113b-20: de phan chad de dag gi ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyod pa /
K10D0275_H0277:113b-28: chu bran rnam pa mang po dag ji srid du
K10D0275_H0277:113b-29: rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par ma gyur pa de
K10D0275_H0277:113b-30: srid du gnas tha dad pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:113b-34: so so rang gi bya ba sgrub pa'i las can gyi chu dang /
K10D0275_H0277:113b-35: srog chags chu nas skyes pa brul bu dag gi 'tsho ba nye bar ston pa'i gnas yin no //
K10D0275_H0277:114a-1: chen por zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe gnas tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114a-2: chu tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114a-5: bya ba sgrub pa gcig pa'i las can gyi chu dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114a-6: srog chags chu nas skyes pa phal po che chen
K10D0275_H0277:114a-7: po rnams kyi 'tsho ba nye bar ston pa'i gnas
K10D0275_H0277:114a-8: yin no // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0275_H0277:114a-9: rnams ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
K10D0275_H0277:114a-10: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgya mtsho chen
K10D0275_H0277:114a-11: por zhugs par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas
K10D0275_H0277:114a-13: ye shes tha dad pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114a-14: ye shes chung ba dang; ye shes skye 'grib yod pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114a-15: so so rang gi bya ba sgrub pa'i las can gyi ye shes dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114a-16: sems can nyung du dag yongs su smin par 'gyur
K10D0275_H0277:114a-17: ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas yin no; ;gang tshun
K10D0275_H0277:114a-18: chad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings
K10D0275_H0277:114a-19: rnam par dag pa'i rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par
K10D0275_H0277:114a-20: gyur pa de'i tshe gnas tha dad pa ma yin
K10D0275_H0277:114a-21: pa dang / ye shes tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114a-22: ye shes tshad med pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114a-23: ye shes skye 'grib med pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114a-24: ye shes kyi rdzogs par longs spyad pa /
K10D0275_H0277:114a-29: sems can tshad med pa dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114a-30: yongs su smin par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag @114b bka' stsal to //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-1: chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-2: sgrib gnyis ldan dag mtshan nyid can //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-3: dngos po shes pa de dmigs pa //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-4: dbang tshad mi shes mtshan nyid can //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-5: de bzhin nyid shes thams cad nas //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-6: bsgoms las yang dag 'grub pa can //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-7: sems can kun la gnyis skyed pa //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-8: rnam kun mi zad 'bras bu can //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-9: lus dang ngag dang sems sprul pa'i //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-10: sbyor ba'i thabs kyi las can yin //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-11: ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs sgo dang //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-12: dpag tu med pa gnyis dang ldan //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-13: rang bzhin chos rdzogs longs spyod dang //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-14: sprul pas tha dad 'jug pa can //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-15: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-16: rnam dag 'di ni yang dag brjod //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114b-18: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114b-19: nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114b-20: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114b-24: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0275_H0277:114b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0275_H0277:114b-26: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0275_H0277:114b-27: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang; sh'i lendra po dhi dang /
K10D0275_H0277:114b-29: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes
K10D0275_H0277:114b-30: t'i ka dang sbyar te gsar du bsgyur cing zhus
